name: RevisePhysics(GCSEAQAandEdexcel)
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: revise physics
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Anywhere Alexa goes, your revision goes!

* questions written by experienced UK Physics teachers
* over 800 questions that cover every aspect of the new 9-1 GCSE Physics specification
* choose AQA or Edexcel, combined or separate to make sure you only learn the content that is in the exam
* our unique learning algorithm monitors your progress and ensures frequent review of the questions you are weakest on

***THINGS YOU CAN SAY***
 You can say, "AQA" or "edexcel" to choose the exam board
 You can say, "change the topic" to choose a new topic
 You can say, "give me a hint" to get the first letter of the answer
 You can say, "repeat the question"
 You can say, "go back" to hear the previous question
 You can say, "how am I doing" to hear a statistical report on your progress
 And finally you can say, "wipe all settings" if you want to start fresh
